name: Kean's Blog
body:
### Welcome
Welcome to my blog. I'll be posting thoughts on software, microprocessors, maths, engineering and more.

The tagline for this blog is a twist on the title of various "Teach Yourself X in 21 Days" books. Peter Norvig has advocated [teaching yourself programming in ten years](http://norvig.com/21-days.html), but I don't think even 10 years is enough. I think you can spend a whole lifetime trying to master programming and not even cover a fraction of what's our there to learn. It's an impossible goal, so the best you can do is learn as much as you can and enjoy the journey!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
